import { useState} from 'react' import MovieCard from './MovieCard' function FilterList() { const [findmovies, setMoviesBy] = useState([]) function FindMovie(selectedGenre) { fetch('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie?api_key=9122d3e99f5cf10f65b111a1dcd51b20&with_genres=' + selectedGenre + '&primary_release_year=&language=ru-RU&page=1') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setMoviesBy(data.results) }) } return ( <>

) } export default GenreList;
